alert.note: Alert for Barry; Lawrence (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 11 at 11:42PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL BARRY AND LAWRENCE COUNTIES THROUGH 1215 AM CST... At 1141 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Pierce City to near Purdy. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Monett, Aurora, Mount Vernon, Marionville, Purdy, Miller, Verona, Stotts City, Halltown, Freistatt, Hoberg, Chesapeake, Pleasant Ridge, and Madry. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 37 and 58. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
